Title: Downloads resources over HTTP
Description: During installation hubl-server downloads a set of dependencies from api.hubapi.com. It appears in the code that these files are downloaded over HTTPS however the api.hubapi.com endpoint redirects to a HTTP url. Because of this behavior an attacker with the ability to man-in-the-middle a developer or system performing a package installation could compromise the integrity of the installation.
Solution: There is no solution for this vulnerability at the moment, so this is recommended to use a different module.
